name: tourism_economy_by_canton
title: Regional indicators of the Tourism Satellite Accounts by canton and product
title_en: Regional indicators of the Tourism Satellite Accounts by canton and product
description: This dataset presents the yearly data on tourism expenditure, tourism-related employment and tourism-connected gross value added (Tourism Satellite Accounts) by canton and product, since 2016.
description_en: This dataset presents the yearly data on tourism expenditure, tourism-related employment and tourism-connected gross value added (Tourism Satellite Accounts) by canton and product, since 2016.
